### Who am I?

<img style = "max-width: 100%; 
              max-height = 100%; 
              display:block; 
              margin:auto" 
              src="whoami.jpg" 
              width = 600px/>

Like most people who will read this blog, I am a nerd, and a proud R nerd at that `r emoji::emoji("joy")`.

I am an R-Lady and proud member of AfricaR. `r emoji::emoji("earth_africa")`

I am a certified RStudio [Tidyverse instructor](https://bit.ly/my-rstudio-cert-profile).

I'm a mum, and hence that last picture of me visiting some far out galaxy ('cos that's what you do when you have young kids, go on many adventures in far out places). 

#### Resources

- Please subscribe to [RWeekly](https://rweekly.org), they put out a weekly newsletter, and showcase much learning material, including mine.
- Please consider giving [me](https://twitter.com/Sciencificity) a follow. I announce there once a new blog post is up.
- Please give [R posts you might have missed](https://twitter.com/icymi_r) a follow. The account puts out much learning material regarding R, you are bound to find something you're interested in `r emoji::emoji("books")` `r emoji::emoji("upward")`.
